# Philip Ross - Automation Consultant

> Automation consultant based in Dundee, Scotland helping organisations automate repetitive tasks with a 10× return on investment.

## Services

I help organisations identify and automate repetitive manual tasks, building systems that deliver an average 10× return on time invested. Every hour I invest saves clients 10 hours of staff time annually.

### Specializations
- Process Automation
- Data Processing Automation
- Reporting Systems
- Grant Writing Automation
- Production Tracking Systems

## Contact

Based in Dundee, Scotland, UK
Website: https://ros-2.github.io/
Contact form available at: https://ros-2.github.io/#contact

## Recent Projects

- Fundraising Automation: Built system for charity to automate grant applications, saving 6 working days per year
- Production Tracking: Created unified tracker for publishing house, saving 13 working days per year
- Sales Data Restructuring: Rebuilt database for charitable enterprise, saving 13 working days per year
- Till Data Automation: Automated sales data processing for charity shops, saving 11 working days per year

## Background

Electrical and Mechanical Engineering degree from University of Strathclyde. Previously worked at Dijuno, an AI analytics startup serving companies including Coca-Cola, where I developed expertise in LLM testing, prompt engineering, and Python automation.

## Technologies

Google Applications Script, Python, Claude, Looker Studio, Custom GPTs
